description: This file contains C source code related to managing VLAN and trunk port states, including functions for loading, saving, adding, removing, and referencing ports and entities within a VLAN trunk configuration context.

classes.name: VlanTrunkState
classes.description: Represents the state of a VLAN trunk, including associated entities, ports, and dirty flags.

classes.name: PVlanTrunkState
classes.description: Pointer to a VLAN trunk state object.

classes.name: PEntityPortList
classes.description: Represents a list of ports associated with an entity within a VLAN trunk.

classes.name: PPlatformPort
classes.description: Pointer to a platform-specific port object.

classes.name: PEntityPath
classes.description: Represents a dependent path between entities in the VLAN configuration.

classes.name: PTrunkPort
classes.description: Represents a trunk port with associated entity ports and dependency paths.

classes.name: List
classes.description: Generic list structure used to manage collections of entities, ports, and paths.

methods.name: int getVlanState(PVlanTrunkState * vidState,int vid)
methods.description: Retrieves existing VLAN state or creates a new one for a given VLAN ID.

methods.name: int saveVlanState(PVlanTrunkState vidState)
methods.description: Persists the current VLAN state, including entity memberships and trunk port configurations.

methods.name: int loadVlanState(PVlanTrunkState vidState)
methods.description: Loads VLAN state from the external system into internal data structures.

methods.name: int addAndGetTrunkPorts(PVlanTrunkState vidState,PPlatformPort newPort,PList listToAppend)
methods.description: Adds a trunk port to VLAN state and retrieves associated ports, updating internal state.

methods.name: int removeAndGetTrunkPorts(PVlanTrunkState vidState,PPlatformPort oldPort,PList listToAppend)
methods.description: Removes a trunk port from VLAN state and updates the port list accordingly.

methods.name: int addMemberPort(PEntityPortList entity,PPlatformPort port)
methods.description: Adds a platform port to an entity's member port list.

methods.name: int remMemberPort(PEntityPortList entity,PPlatformPort port)
methods.description: Removes a platform port from an entity's member port list.

methods.name: int deRefEntity(PVlanTrunkState vidState,int entity,PPlatformPort port)
methods.description: De-references (removes) an entity and its ports from VLAN state.

methods.name: PEntityPortList getEntity(PVlanTrunkState vidState,int entity)
methods.description: Retrieves an entity's port list within VLAN state by entity ID.

methods.name: int refTrunkPort(PVlanTrunkState vidState,PPlatformPort port,PEntityPath path)
methods.description: References (adds) a trunk port to VLAN state and associates a dependency path.

methods.name: int addPathToTrunkPort(PTrunkPort port,PEntityPath path)
methods.description: Adds a dependency path to a trunk port.

methods.name: PTrunkPort addTrunkPort(PVlanTrunkState vidState,PPlatformPort platport)
methods.description: Creates and adds a new trunk port to VLAN state.

methods.name: int deRefTrunkPort(PTrunkPort port,int entity)
methods.description: De-references (removes) dependency paths from a trunk port associated with an entity.

methods.name: PEntityPortList addEntity(PVlanTrunkState vidState,int entity)
methods.description: Creates and adds a new entity to the VLAN trunk state.

ctags.name: addAndGetTrunkPorts
ctags.pattern: /^int addAndGetTrunkPorts(PVlanTrunkState vidState, PPlatformPort newPort, PList listToAppend) {$/

ctags.name: deRefEntity
ctags.pattern: /^int deRefEntity(PVlanTrunkState vidState, int entity, PPlatformPort port) {$/

ctags.name: refTrunkPort
ctags.pattern: /^int refTrunkPort(PVlanTrunkState vidState, PPlatformPort port, PEntityPath path) {$/

ctags.name: removeAndGetTrunkPorts
ctags.pattern: /^int removeAndGetTrunkPorts(PVlanTrunkState vidState, PPlatformPort oldPort, PList listToAppend){$/
